snippet: The latest telegraphic dispatches from Pictou, and letters from the scenes of the late fearful storm in the Gulf of St. Lawrence and along the coast of Prince Edward's Island, state that the whole shore is strewed with the wrecks of vessels and th...
lead_paragraph: The latest telegraphic dispatches from Pictou, and letters from the scenes of the late fearful storm in the Gulf of St. Lawrence and along the coast of Prince Edward's Island, state that the whole shore is strewed with the wrecks of vessels and the dead bodies of their crews.

headline.main: Further Particulars of the Storm and Marine Disasters on the Coast of Nova Scotia.
